testcase.name: should register itself to the socket registry on initialization
should throw an error if the intent category is not specified
should throw an error if the intent action is not specified
should throw an error if the intent provider is not specified
should throw an error if the intent view does not exist
should throw an error if the intent controller does not exist
should throw an error if the intent provider is not valid
should throw an error if the intent is already registered
should send error message if the intent category is missing
should send error message if the intent action is missing
should send error message if the intent context is missing
should send error message if the session could not be retrieved
should create the rain context and render the component
should send error message if the intent is not authorized
should execute the server-side controller associated with the intent
